tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketData (
  date DATE,
  symbol VARCHAR,
  open_price DECIMAL,
  close_price DECIMAL,
  volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE portfolio_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE investment_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    risk_level INT,
    portfolio_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolio_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Market_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE Investment_Trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_text VARCHAR(255),
    trend_score DECIMAL,
    trend_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Retirement_Portfolios (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_name VARCHAR(100),
    assets TEXT,
    risk_level INT,
    user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE User_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    retirement_age INT
)

CREATE TABLE Prediction_Logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    prediction_date DATE,
    prediction_text TEXT,
    confidence_score DECIMAL,
    user_id INT
)
